entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Aug 29, 18:31 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 29, 18:24 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We have fully deployed a mitigation and are observing improved success rates for Codespaces creation and resumption operations.

Aug 29, 18:21 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Aug 29, 17:48 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We have authored a mitigation that will be deployed within 30 minutes. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 17:16 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We are authoring a mitigation that will be deployed within one hour. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 16:34 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We are authoring a mitigation that will be deployed within 90 minutes. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 16:02 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers. We are authoring a mitigation that will be deployed within two hours. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 15:21 UTC
Update - We continuing to identify an issue that impacts most Codespaces customers and are working on mitigation. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 14:19 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Aug 29, 13:37 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts many Codespaces customers and are working on mitigation. We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

Aug 29, 12:51 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Aug 16, 16:32 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 16, 16:01 UTC
Update - We are still verifying our hotfix for Codespaces web client us-east outage. Note: Workaround is to use VS Code desktop client. ETA ~45m

Aug 16, 15:13 UTC
Update - We are testing a hotfix for our Codespaces web client us-east outage. Note: Workaround is to use VS Code desktop client. ETA ~1h.

Aug 16, 14:28 UTC
Update - We have identified the issue with Codespaces in the us-east region preventing web client use. Please use the VS Code desktop client as a workaround. Hotfix is underway, ETA 1h.

Aug 16, 13:51 UTC
Update - We identified an issue that impacts some Codespaces customers and are working on mitigation.We will continue to keep you updated on progress.

The VS Code desktop client can be used as a workaround.

Aug 16, 13:38 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces
entry.content:
Aug 15, 13:18 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 15, 10:55 UTC
Update - We are investigating reports of issues with Codespaces in the eu-west region(s). Users in that location may not be able to connect to their Codespaces during this time. We are investigating contributing factors and will update you on progress towards mitigation.

Aug 15, 10:50 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: GitHub Enterprise Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Jun 29, 19:56 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 29, 17:48 UTC
Update - Migrations to GitHub using the GitHub Enterprise Importer are currently paused. Migrations will still queue, but won't run until the pause is removed. The pause is expected to be lifted by 20:30 UTC.

Jun 29, 16:26 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 29, 16:24 UTC
Scheduled - Migrations to GitHub using the GitHub Enterprise Importer are currently paused. Migrations will still queue, but won't run until the pause is removed.
